name: Puppet Master: The Game (Multiplayer Prototype)
description:
This is a prototype designed to test some gameplay concepts and is not intended to be a completed game.

The Puppets are back! Play as Blade, Jester, Tunneler, Torch, Decapitron, Pinhead, and  Leech Woman! As the puppets hunt down Nazi Agents and stop them from uncovering Toulon's secretes of animation. Sneak up on your prey and unleash a pint-sized siege of terror.

Multiplayer Only - First-person - Shooter - Horror
